recording_nervous.label: I’m not comfortable being recorded.
script: Totally fair — thanks for saying that.
We only record for training and quality so we can actually help people better.
If you'd rather not be recorded, we can keep going without it or reschedule — what feels best?

not_sure_yet.label: I’m just not sure yet.
script: Totally makes sense — you shouldn't be sure yet.
That’s the point of this call: to get you clarity before making decisions.
Let’s walk through where you're at and see if this even makes sense.

money_worried.label: I’m worried about the money.
script: Totally fair — most people aren’t sitting on extra cash.
Let me ask you something real quick:
Is this more 'I literally don't have it,' or 'I have it but I'm not sure if this is the right place to put it?',
If it's the second one, we can walk through what you actually get and whether it lines up with your goals.
If it’s the first, then we may need to zoom out and find a plan that doesn’t stretch you too thin.

training_cost.label: Why does the training cost money?
script: Good question — if this were just a bunch of videos in a portal, I'd agree with you.
But this is real coaching, with live calls, curriculum, and skill development.
This program exists to help you increase your income — not sell you information.
If you put in the reps, it returns far more than it costs.

commission_only.label: I’m nervous about commission-only.
script: Totally understandable — most people were raised to think salary equals safety.
Commission simply means you get paid what you're worth, not what a company thinks you're worth.
It requires a little courage and a lot of skill — which is exactly what we help build.
If the idea of performance-based pay excites you even a little, that’s a good sign.

need_to_think.label: I need to think about it.
script: Totally fair — anything meaningful is worth thinking about.
Just so I follow up on the right thing, when you say 'think about it,' what will you actually be thinking through?
Usually it’s one of three things: the money, the time, or 'will this work for me?',
Which one is it for you so we can cut through the fog?
